synopsis.text: Nobunaga Oda's shadow looms over a war-torn Japan during the Sengoku Jidai, but one warlord finds solace in an unexpected art form. Furuta Sasuke, a vassal of the powerful Nobunaga, is torn between his ambition for advancement and his deep-rooted passion for the tea ceremony. As the world crumbles around him, Furuta embarks on the path of the Hyouge Mono, a journey shaped by the teachings of Nobunaga and the legendary tea master Sen no Soueki. Originally a manga series in Kodansha's Morning magazine since 2005, this captivating tale has won prestigious accolades, including the Grand Prize at the 14th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prizes and an Excellence Prize at the 13th Japan Media Arts Festival Awards. Delve into the life of Furuta Sasuke, a man caught between the chaos of war and the tranquility of his beloved tea ceremony.
